title: Ashley Graham shows off her growing baby bump in skin-tight dress on her 32nd birthday
text:
Ashley Graham's due date is inching closer but it sure is not slowing the beauty down in the least bit.

On Wednesday - which is the star's 32nd birthday - the Vogue model stepped out in New York City as she made her way to the Today Show.

This morning, she co-hosted the show with Hoda Kotb while ringing in the big 3-2.

Birthday girl: Ashley Graham stepped out in New York on Wednesday morning as she headed to the Today Show for her co-hosting gig

Important job: This morning, she co-hosted the morning show with Hoda Kotb while ringing in the big 3-2

For her early morning appearance she wore a tan-colored dress that showed off her toned curves and growing baby bump.

The dress was a long sleeve and had a v-neck cut along with a color that she had popped along her neck.

As she walked, she cradled her bump while sporting a pair of black boots with a snakeskin high heel.

Looking good: For her early morning appearance she wore a tan-colored dress that showed off her toned curves and growing baby bump

Ashley made sure to change it up ahead of her appearance and changed into a gray long sleeve dress.

After her segment, she shared a photo of her sitting next to her 'idol' Hoda as they smiled for the camera.

'Woke up another year older and filled with gratitude today! AND I get to spend my morning co-hosting @todayshow with one of my role models @hodakotb. Tune in now! @hodaandjenna,' she said in the post.

Happy: She gave a big smile as she headed inside the studio and even stopped to take a couple pictures with fans

Guest host: This morning Ashley spent her birthday morning guest-hosting the Today Show with Hoda Kotb

The model and her husband Justin Ervin announced back in August that they are expecting their first child together.

'Nine years ago today, I married the love of my life,' she wrote. 'It has been the best journey with my favorite person in the world! Today, we are feeling so blessed, grateful and excited to celebrate with our GROWING FAMILY! Happy anniversary, @mrjustinervin. Life is about to get even better,' they shared on their wedding anniversary.

The two have yet to reveal the gender and name of the baby.
description:
Ashley Graham's due date is inching closer.
And on Wednesday morning the model, 32, stepped out in New York to celebrate her birthday as she headed to the Today Show.
